metadata.title: CVE-2024-2182 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The default configuration of OVN would inappropriately enable OVSBidirectional Forwarding Detection on logical ports; an attacker couldabuse this to disrupt traffic by abusing the BFD protocol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2182` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovn-central - 22.03.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
ovn-common - 22.03.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
ovn-controller-vtep - 22.03.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
ovn-host - 22.03.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
ovn-ic - 22.03.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
ovn-ic-db - 22.03.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ovn package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '22.03.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.2').
